@everyone 

# This channel has been officially replaced by our new bug report system, using <@1184694752084500611>  # 

this was done because its hard to keep track of questions here and reports.

# How to use it: # 

-bug (the bugs description)

additionally, attaching an image to the message will provide additional info to us.

**(please note that this is ONLY for modernbox)**

any abuse of this system could result in a ban so dont do it

content: for the tab issue, do the following: first, find and open 'modernbox' in your Steam workshop files, then open the 'GameResources' folder, go to the 'UI' folder, and copy all its contents. To do this, press Ctrl + A and then Ctrl + C. Next, go back to your mod files, open 'GameResourceReplace,' go to 'UI,' then to the 'icons' folder, and paste the copied files here
